Blog.post: wahhahahaha...2day is a pretty gd day.... juz dam tired after a whole day of activities... whhwaha... had band.. dam boring lorx 2day.. keep playing the same song bt its quite funny larx.. den we rachell ngangy the ngang hse.. wahwhhwah.. her doggy dam cute lorx bt nv bath wan! hahahahahah....juz jk..i'm dead tired.. tink i will sleeep dam early 2day.. anw not much shows on sat and i had sat the most.. so boring.. i'm dying of boreness... whahwah.. anw.. 2day the tuition quite fun larx... nanasa dam funNY and tt stupid ZL keep insluting me.. whahwahwh... mon i'm gonna smack him everywhere.. ahhaha.. even if i dun, rachel will do it 4 me.. whahahha... she always whack him wan.. dam pain sia!bt he deserve it.. whahah.. hu ask him told so much rubbbish! hawhahwhha..____ LiTtle OrAnGe pAPayA**

lalalallala.. hahahahaha. 2day better den yesterdae.. anw its the past.. ahahhahahahahahahaha... i'm freaking happy in some ways bt also very fed up in another way! ahahhahaha... i saw little orange papaya.. ahahha.. at least i get to talk 2 him... lalalalal... and those stuffs i pass it 2 him yesterdae i tink.. hahah.. his dam cute larx.. so funnY! yeah! tmr gt Band! hahhahah..happy in other words.. hahahaha.. bt band really long hours and i'm in the CLARINET section... ahhahaha... thats FUN! and tt cute little kenneth neo! so cubby i feel like pinching.. ahaha and finally can talk to teow teow... so long nv talk to her le.. haaahaha.. and guess wat will i tell her?? dun tell u! hehee! honestly, i LOVE friday man! haaa. heheeee.. lets do a countdown..11 more days! HAAHAH... and 2day is like dam funny.. waited 4 luah so long... walk up n down the stairs looking 4 her.. and she went 4 course..... irrtating larx.. den wasted so much my time.. btw, i have a test tmr! and its realllllllly annoying larx... muz study.. and i better stop slacking.. EXAMS are round the corner lorx.. if i dun do well 4 my A maths arh.. tt stupid old man will make us drop arh.. whole day 5 5 5 5 5.. 5 his head larx. ahahhaha.. at least his better today bt jus as bad larx.. ahahah i'm contradicting myself.. tts dumb! AHHAHA... anw gtg.. ahhawhah... _little ORaNge PApAyA***

GUESS wat! gt scolded by fat yaw today.. tt stupid old man! act smart not smart.. WTH! whole day boast abt himself. STUPID ARROGANT FREAK! dam him! i simply hate him...WHAHWHAHWAHWH! his FOS!
